title: Replace Download Bill with html2pdf.js PDF generation

requirements.summary: Replace plain-text download with PDF generation using html2pdf.js library, capturing bill content and downloading as zweeti-bill.pdf
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Download Bill' generates and downloads a PDF file named 'zweeti-bill.pdf'.
The downloaded PDF contains the customer name, all bill items with price and quantity, subtotal, GST (5%), and grand total.
html2pdf.js is used for PDF generation.
The 'Download Bill' button is not visible when the browser print dialog is triggered.
No plain-text .txt file is downloaded; only the PDF output is produced.

file_operations.description: Add html2pdf.js as a dependency to enable PDF generation functionality. Install the npm package 'html2pdf.js' compatible with the existing React/Vite build setup.

Replace the current handleDownload function that creates a plain-text file with new PDF generation logic using html2pdf.js. Import the html2pdf library at the top of the file. Update the handleDownload function to: (1) select the bill content area containing customer name, items table, subtotal, GST, and grand total using a ref or querySelector, (2) configure html2pdf with appropriate options (filename: 'zweeti-bill.pdf', margins, format), (3) call html2pdf to capture the content and trigger download. Ensure the 'Download Bill' button retains the existing hidden-on-print class so it remains hidden during print. Remove any code that generates or downloads .txt files.
